attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When congestion charging was first introduced. It was said that it was not about making money. But to make traffic flow more freely in London. If it is not about making money. (1)Then make all sign written commercial vehicles excempt from payment. As they have to be there to carry out there work and deliveries, (2)Also a minimal parking charge applies to sign written commercial vehicles.

rejection.details: you need to remove your name from the title
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
